title: Incorrect error message  of missing but existing section in RClone config
body:
Dear Developers and Community,

Thank you heartfelt for the ineffably marvelous project, art you do...

#### What is the problem you are having with rclone?

RClone states relatively incorrect error message for when trying to use a config copied from Windows to Linux environment (WSL).

The message is:

> ...didn't find section in config file

Despite the fact that there's the section.

I am not a frequent Windows user but Linux, and using `strace` and more verbose logging suggests that the reason it determines the section absent is probably due to the colon used for the Windows partition (i.e. `E:`), and that, in turn, causes a conflict with the RClone syntax for remotes the program encounters during a complete destination resolution.

#### What is your rclone version (output from `rclone version`)

```
rclone v1.68.1
- os/version: ubuntu 22.04 (64 bit)
- os/kernel: 5.15.153.1-microsoft-standard-WSL2 (x86_64)
- os/type: linux
- os/arch: amd64
- go/version: go1.23.1
- go/linking: static
- go/tags: none
```

#### Which OS you are using and how many bits (e.g. Windows 7, 64 bit)

`Ubuntu 24.04`, `64 bit`

```
Linux h1 5.15.153.1-microsoft-standard-WSL2 #1 SMP Fri Mar 29 23:14:13 UTC 2024 x86_64 x86_64 x86_64 GNU/Linux
```

#### Which cloud storage system are you using? (e.g. Google Drive)

None

#### The command you were trying to run (e.g. `rclone copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

```bash
$ rclone -vvv --config ./test.conf lsd -- 'h1_test:';
```

#### A log from the command with the `-vv` flag (e.g. output from `rclone -vv copy /tmp remote:tmp`)

```plain
2024/11/10 19:03:30 DEBUG : rclone: Version "v1.68.1" starting with parameters ["rclone" "-vvv" "--config" "./test.conf" "lsd" "--" "h1_test:"]
2024/11/10 19:03:30 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote "h1_test:"
2024/11/10 19:03:30 DEBUG : Using config file from "/home/user/temp/test.conf"
2024/11/10 19:03:30 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote "h1_partition_e:test"
2024/11/10 19:03:30 DEBUG : Creating backend with remote "E:test"
2024/11/10 19:03:30 CRITICAL: Failed to create file system for "h1_test:": didn't find section in config file
```

#### Addendum

A configuration to reproduce the case (i.e. `test.conf`):
```ini
[h1_partition_e]
type = alias
remote = E:

[h1_test]
type = alias
remote = h1_partition_e:test
```

Thank you! ‚ú®

Best and kind regards
